description: Vegans rejoice! We have the perfect vegan dessert recipe for you. Whip up these chocolate cashew bites for a delish no-bake snack or on-the-go treat.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,No-bake desserts,Sesame free,Summer,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate,Vegan,Autumn,Apr 2021,Peanut free
name: Vegan ChocCashew Bites With Cacao Nibs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 45g vegan salted caramel chocolate, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Add cacao powder and coconut, then process until combined. Add cacao nibs, maple syrup, cashew butter and 1/3 cup water, then process until combined. Transfer mixture to a bowl. Stir in caramel chocolate.
Line a baking tray with baking paper. Using damp hands, roll level tablespoons of mixture into balls and place on tray.
Place milk chocolate in a snaplock bag and snip off 1 corner. Drizzle balls with chocolate. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until balls are firm and chocolate has set. Serve.
